products.name: iPhone 12
products.title: The iPhone 12 display has rounded corners that follow a beautiful curved design, and these corners are within a standard rectangle. When measured as a standard rectangular shape, the screen is 6.06 inches diagonally (actual viewable area is less)
products.description:
Super Retina XDR display
6.1‑inch (diagonal) all‑screen OLED display
2532‑by‑1170-pixel resolution at 460 ppi
HDR display
True Tone
Wide color (P3)
Haptic Touch
2,000,000:1 contrast ratio (typical)
625 nits max brightness (typical); 1200 nits peak brightness (HDR)
Fingerprint-resistant oleophobic coating
Support for display of multiple languages and characters simultaneously

products.name: Samsung Galaxy S21
products.title: The Samsung Galaxy S21 features a stunning AMOLED display, powerful performance, and a versatile camera system.
products.description:
Dynamic AMOLED 2X display
6.2-inch (diagonal) all-screen display
2400 x 1080-pixel resolution at 421 ppi
HDR10+ support
Adaptive refresh rate up to 120Hz
Exynos/Snapdragon chipset
12GB RAM
Triple camera system with ultrawide and telephoto lenses
8K video recording
4500mAh battery
5G connectivity

products.title: The Google Pixel 6 offers a clean Android experience and top-notch camera capabilities.
products.description:
OLED display
6.4-inch (diagonal) display

Adaptive refresh rate up to 120Hz
Google Tensor chipset
8GB RAM
Dual camera system with AI enhancements
Night Sight, Super Res Zoom, and HDR+ enhanced
4000mAh battery
5G connectivity
